alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Madison (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 01 at 10:31PM CST until March 01 at 11:00PM CST by NWS Huntsville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Huntsville Alabama has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Jackson County in northeastern Alabama... Central Madison County in north central Alabama... * Until 1100 PM CST. * At 1030 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Gurley, or 8 miles east of Huntsville, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Huntsville, Scottsboro, Redstone Arsenal, Moores Mill, Skyline, Gurley, Alabama A And M University, Marshall Space Flight Center, University Of Alabama In Huntsville and Pleasant Groves. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CST for north central and northeastern Alabama...and Middle Tennessee.
